$interpreted: Sherlock: Yikes! This is none of my business! Don't attack me!
Sherlock: Such misfortune...I'm definitely not doing business with any Sun nobles again!
Sherlock: Uggghhhh... Great, now I'm actually gonna die here. It's all their fault...
Lisa: Don't you dare harm my father!
Lisa: Father...we finally found you...didn't you say you're going out of town for a business trip? How did you get involved in this war?
Sherlock: I would very much prefer NOT to be involved...Umm, why are you guys here?
Ned: It's president Karen of the Commerce Chamber. She asked us to come here and find Sir Sherlock.
Sherlock: Her?
Soldier: Quick, allies of the rebel army here!
Sherlock: Damn it! I told you that this is none of my business! If I'm gonna get attacked anyway, might as well help the princess!
Lisa: Eh? Did I hear that right? Father said he's going to help someone!?
Ned: Those who attempt to harm father and Lisa will not live to see another day!
Sherlock: Arghhhhhh!!!
Injured Soldier: ...That's the current situation. His Majesty Theodore is in serious trouble! We hereby request the Twelve Nobles' assistance!
Male Noble: ......
Injured Soldier: Why is everyone dead silent? Are the Twelve Nobles breaking their oath of loyalty to the Carlos family!?
Female Noble: ...But Rayzor...
Crushfang: Breaking an oath is unacceptable.
Sione: However, a small delay won't hurt.
Male Noble: Sione from the Aldric family? Aren't you────
Sione: Apologies in advance. Everybody here is now being held hostage by me.
Injured Soldier: Nonsense! With just you two?

Injured Soldier: As long as everyone in this tent cries out for help, 
the private armies of the Twelve Nobles will rush in and take care of you two in no time!
Crushfang: Certainly, you have a point.
Crushfang: ────However, do these people really want to cry out for help?
Injured Soldier: Everyone?
Male Noble: ......
Sione: The Twelve Nobles' oath is to remain loyal to the Carlos family. Right now, you are temporarily held hostage by me, that's all.
Sione: You were forced to act against your own will. It won't be too late to deploy your troops after the dust has settled.
Sione: Regardless of who the final victor is, I believe the new king will not blame any of you for your actions.
Female Noble: ...We wouldn't really be breaking the oath...and we don't have to face the Rayzor head on...
Male Noble: Most importantly, we don't have to worry about picking the wrong side!
Injured Soldier: So you guys are really going to pretend you're being held hostage? You're just going to play dumb────
Crushfang: The art of playing dumb, is an essential part of being good leader.
Crushfang: Care to correct me, leaders of the Twelve Nobles?
Male Noble: Since we're in your hands now, do your worst! May the glory of the Carlos family shine forever!
Crushfang: ......
Sione: ......
Tica: Ah, right. There's still this guy...
Tica: The mastermind has gotten away. What should we do with this young fella?
Lio: He's from Theodore's side, right?
Leah: Then that makes him the bad guy! Let's ignore him and leave~
Ralph: The princess...will emerge as the final victor of this war...? How dare... you spew...such nonsense...
Ralph: His Majesty Theodore has planned for so long for this moment...it will not fail...it absolutely, will not fail again...
Ralph: ARRGGGHHHHH!!
Leah: His Soul Energy is so creepy...
Tica: Holy crap! Sis Leah, quick! Come help me out!
Tica: WAHHHHH!!!
Ralph: Fail...ure...no...this time, I will not...fail...again...
Ralph: Here...I come...Your Majesty...Theodore...
Fredrica: Not too shabby~ However, you're still no match for the kingdom army. I suggest you surrender sooner than later~
Dagger: Surrender to Theodore's minions? I'd rather die in the war!
Fredrica: Well~ Then I can't do anything else. Here goes...
Dagger: Hmph, so you're finally here. You took so long that I thought you guys gave me cold shoulder!
Roger: Shut it, big guy! Your letter only said, "Please come help". Turns out you want us to help you fight the kingdom army!
Kittyeyes: Besides, you didn't even put in a clear location! We took so long because we were trying to find where the heck you are!
Dagger: This is my first time asking humans for help, so cut some slack.
Dagger: Anyway, thanks for helping. Having you guys is like having hundreds of soldiers with me!
Fredrica: Where did these bandits come from? Get rid of them!
Fredrica: Y-You're pretty good...
Sharice: You bastards...I will not accept defeat! It's do-or-die time!
Fredrica: Now now~ That's enough~ We surrender. Please let everyone go.
Sharice: But General...they are rebels! Should we really surrender to them!?
Fredrica: The tide of the battle is slowly turning. If the other option is letting my men die fighting an unwinnable war, I'd rather keep everyone alive.
Fredrica: As long as you live, there's still plenty of other things you can do~
Fredrica: Young lady, life is very precious. It's okay to be energetic, but don't throw your life away for something this meaningless~~
Sharice: General Fredrica...
Dagger: If that's your decision, then there is no point for us to continue.
Roger: You guys should be grateful that you have a general who treasures her own subordinates.
Fredrica: Oh my, now that I take a good look, aren't you a handsome one~
Fredrica: I'm your prisoner of war now. You can do whatever~you~want~to~me.
Kittyeyes: You...!
Ralph: Traitor......
Ralph: His Majesty Theodore's enemies...those who betrayed his Majesty Theodore...all of them...must...be...destroyed...!
Ralph: Kill...destroy...traitors...
Ralph: Your Majesty...your most loyal servant...is coming...
Fredrica: ...The way his Soul Energy is flowing...
Fredrica: Could he have used the northern...
Dagger: ...Over there, in that direction. Is that...
Dagger: Angelia!?
Dagger: Darn it! Have to stop him no matter what!

Model.Text: Yikes! This is none of my business! Don't attack me!
Such misfortune...I'm definitely not doing business with any Sun nobles again!
Uggghhhh... Great, now I'm actually gonna die here. It's all their fault...
Don't you dare harm my father!
Father...we finally found you...didn't you say you're going out of town for a business trip? How did you get involved in this war?
I would very much prefer NOT to be involved...Umm, why are you guys here?
It's president Karen of the Commerce Chamber. She asked us to come here and find Sir Sherlock.
Her?
Quick, allies of the rebel army here!
Damn it! I told you that this is none of my business! If I'm gonna get attacked anyway, might as well help the princess!
Eh? Did I hear that right? Father said he's going to help someone!?
Those who attempt to harm father and Lisa will not live to see another day!
Arghhhhhh!!!
...That's the current situation. His Majesty Theodore is in serious trouble! We hereby request the Twelve Nobles' assistance!
Why is everyone dead silent? Are the Twelve Nobles breaking their oath of loyalty to the Carlos family!?
...But Rayzor...
Breaking an oath is unacceptable.
However, a small delay won't hurt.
Sione from the Aldric family? Aren't you────
Apologies in advance. Everybody here is now being held hostage by me.
Nonsense! With just you two?

As long as everyone in this tent cries out for help, 
the private armies of the Twelve Nobles will rush in and take care of you two in no time!
Certainly, you have a point.
────However, do these people really want to cry out for help?
Everyone?
The Twelve Nobles' oath is to remain loyal to the Carlos family. Right now, you are temporarily held hostage by me, that's all.
You were forced to act against your own will. It won't be too late to deploy your troops after the dust has settled.
Regardless of who the final victor is, I believe the new king will not blame any of you for your actions.
...We wouldn't really be breaking the oath...and we don't have to face the Rayzor head on...
Most importantly, we don't have to worry about picking the wrong side!
So you guys are really going to pretend you're being held hostage? You're just going to play dumb────
The art of playing dumb, is an essential part of being good leader.
Care to correct me, leaders of the Twelve Nobles?
Since we're in your hands now, do your worst! May the glory of the Carlos family shine forever!
Ah, right. There's still this guy...
The mastermind has gotten away. What should we do with this young fella?
He's from Theodore's side, right?
Then that makes him the bad guy! Let's ignore him and leave~
The princess...will emerge as the final victor of this war...? How dare... you spew...such nonsense...
His Majesty Theodore has planned for so long for this moment...it will not fail...it absolutely, will not fail again...
ARRGGGHHHHH!!
His Soul Energy is so creepy...
Holy crap! Sis Leah, quick! Come help me out!
WAHHHHH!!!
Fail...ure...no...this time, I will not...fail...again...
Here...I come...Your Majesty...Theodore...
Not too shabby~ However, you're still no match for the kingdom army. I suggest you surrender sooner than later~
Surrender to Theodore's minions? I'd rather die in the war!
Well~ Then I can't do anything else. Here goes...
Hmph, so you're finally here. You took so long that I thought you guys gave me cold shoulder!
Shut it, big guy! Your letter only said, "Please come help". Turns out you want us to help you fight the kingdom army!
Besides, you didn't even put in a clear location! We took so long because we were trying to find where the heck you are!
This is my first time asking humans for help, so cut some slack.
Anyway, thanks for helping. Having you guys is like having hundreds of soldiers with me!
Where did these bandits come from? Get rid of them!
Y-You're pretty good...
You bastards...I will not accept defeat! It's do-or-die time!
Now now~ That's enough~ We surrender. Please let everyone go.
But General...they are rebels! Should we really surrender to them!?
The tide of the battle is slowly turning. If the other option is letting my men die fighting an unwinnable war, I'd rather keep everyone alive.
As long as you live, there's still plenty of other things you can do~
Young lady, life is very precious. It's okay to be energetic, but don't throw your life away for something this meaningless~~
General Fredrica...
If that's your decision, then there is no point for us to continue.
You guys should be grateful that you have a general who treasures her own subordinates.
Oh my, now that I take a good look, aren't you a handsome one~
I'm your prisoner of war now. You can do whatever~you~want~to~me.
You...!
Traitor......
His Majesty Theodore's enemies...those who betrayed his Majesty Theodore...all of them...must...be...destroyed...!
Kill...destroy...traitors...
Your Majesty...your most loyal servant...is coming...
...The way his Soul Energy is flowing...
Could he have used the northern...
...Over there, in that direction. Is that...
Angelia!?
Darn it! Have to stop him no matter what!

We took so long because we were trying to find where the heck you are!","sfxName":"h0004_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_20_005","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is my first time asking humans for help, so cut some slack.","sfxName":"t0032_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_20_006","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Anyway, thanks for helping. Having you guys is like having hundreds of soldiers with me!","sfxName":"t0032_story_018_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_20_007","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Where did these bandits come from? Get rid of them!","sfxName":"h0135_story_016_ver3","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Y-You're pretty good...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You bastards...I will not accept defeat! It's do-or-die time!","sfxName":"h0138_story_006","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now now~ That's enough~ We surrender. Please let everyone go.","sfxName":"h0135_story_023","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But General...they are rebels! Should we really surrender to them!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The tide of the battle is slowly turning. If the other option is letting my men die fighting an unwinnable war, I'd rather keep everyone alive.","sfxName":"h0135_story_013","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As long as you live, there's still plenty of other things you can do~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_004","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Young lady, life is very precious. It's okay to be energetic, but don't throw your life away for something this meaningless~~","sfxName":"h0135_story_012_ver2","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_22_005","SpeakerName":"Sharice","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0138","IconName":"h0138s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"General Fredrica...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If that's your decision, then there is no point for us to continue.","sfxName":"t0032_story_019_ver1","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Roger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0006","IconName":"h0006s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You guys should be grateful that you have a general who treasures her own subordinates.","sfxName":"h0006_story_015","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh my, now that I take a good look, aren't you a handsome one~","sfxName":"h0135_story_020_ver2","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_23_003","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm your prisoner of war now. You can do whatever~you~want~to~me. ","sfxName":"h0135_story_020_ver3","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_23_004","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Ralph","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3177c4","IconName":"h3177c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Traitor......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Ralph","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3177c4","IconName":"h3177c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"His Majesty Theodore's enemies...those who betrayed his Majesty Theodore...all of them...must...be...destroyed...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Ralph","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3177c4","IconName":"h3177c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Kill...destroy...traitors...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Ralph","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3177c4","IconName":"h3177c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Your Majesty...your most loyal servant...is coming...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...The way his Soul Energy is flowing...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Fredrica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0135","IconName":"h0135s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Could he have used the northern...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Over there, in that direction. Is that...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Angelia!?","sfxName":"t0032_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_016_004_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Darn it! Have to stop him no matter what!","sfxName":"t0032_story_022","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
